name: Amazing Menus for Bravo Studio
description:
5 amazing menus for you to be inspired with!


Learn how to search for inspiration and to design astonishing menus for your apps using Figma, and how to test your prototype on your phone using Bravo Vision.


01 - About me

02 - Icon Plugins: choose your icon style

03 - Menu Inspiration: expand your imagination

04 - Figma Variants: learn how to use it

05 - Bravo Tags + Prototype

06 - Testing on Bravo Vision: check all of it live on your phone http://onelink.to/bravovision

07 - Contact: get in touch! https://pratika.design


Video Tutorial Created in partnership with Bravo Studio

http://onelink.to/bravovision
